articles.title: Cher’s son charged with simple assault and trespassing at New Hampshire private school
articles.description: CONCORD, N.H. (AP) — Police say Cher’s son was arrested on Friday after acting belligerently at a New Hampshire private high school, of which he has no association. Elijah Allman, 49, was charged with four misdemeanors: two counts of simple assault, criminal trespass and criminal threatening.

articles.description: Scientists at Texas A&M are turning an everyday pick-me-up into a high-tech medical switch. articles.description: Lake Powell, the second-largest human-made reservoir in the US, has lost nearly 7% of its potential storage capacity since 1963, when Glen Canyon Dam was built, a new report shows.
